ctx: intros l1 l2 H1 H2 H3.
tactic: destruct H3 as [H4 | [[e H5] | H6]]; auto.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

original: intros l1 l2 H1 H2 H3. destruct H3 as [H4 | [[e H5] | H6]]; auto. + left. apply H4. + right. left. exists e. split; auto. + right. right. apply H6.
